%text For what value of $N$ would the following be true?
\[ \quad \dfrac{\cos 8A\cos 5A-\cos 12A\cos 9A}{\sin 8A\cos 5A+\cos 12A\sin 9A}=\tan NA \] %

step.context: %text \textbf{Product $\longrightarrow$ Sum} Is the following true for \underline\text{P,Q,R and S}? \[\quad \dfrac{\overbrace{\cos 8A\cos 5A}^P-\overbrace{\cos 12A\cos 9A}^Q}{\underbrace{\sin 8A\cos 5A}_R+\underbrace{\cos 12A\sin 9A}_S}\] %
%text \textbf{Plug $\longrightarrow$ Simplify} Given P,Q,R and S from the last step, which of the following is true? %

%text \textbf{Sum $\longrightarrow$ Product} What would be the \underline\text{values of $J$ and $K$} --- and hence of $N$ in the equation below? \[ \qquad \dfrac{\overbrace{\cos 13A -\cos 21A }^J}{\underbrace{\sin 13A + \sin 21A}_K} = \tan NA \] %
